about.title: Understanding Cross-Border Payments From Experience
about.subtitle: Building the payment platform we wished existed during our journey as international students. No more declined cards, hidden fees, or payment uncertainties abroad.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: At Quartis, we recognize the inevitable shift towards real-time payment systems. With over 70% global adoption and billions of transactions processed daily through platforms like PIX, UPI, and SEPA Instant, the future of payments is already here. We're building the infrastructure to connect these systems globally.

story.title: Born from Personal Experience
story.content1: As international students from Brazil at UC Berkeley, we understand firsthand the challenges of international payments. Every declined transaction, hidden fee, and currency conversion headache we experienced shaped our vision for Quartis.
story.content2: We're uniquely positioned to solve this problem because we live it. Our connection to both Brazilian and US markets gives us deep insight into connecting these payment ecosystems. We're not building a theoretical solution â€“ we're creating the platform we wished existed during our own travels.

mission.title: Building Borderless Payments
mission.content: Our mission goes beyond connecting payment systems. We're pioneering the integration of instant payment methods across borders while introducing innovative features previously exclusive to credit cards - bringing rewards and loyalty programs to QR payments for the first time.

beyond.title: Beyond Payments
beyond.content1: At Quartis, we envision a world where financial borders are a thing of the past. Our goal is not just to facilitate payments, but to create a truly global financial ecosystem that empowers individuals and businesses alike. We're working towards a future where currency exchange is seamless, international commerce is frictionless, and financial opportunities are accessible to everyone, regardless of their location.
beyond.content2: With Quartis, we're not just building a payment platform; we're laying the foundation for a more connected and inclusive global economy. By bringing travel rewards to instant payments, we're revolutionizing not just how people pay, but how they experience international travel altogether.

step1.title: Scan the Merchant's QR code
step1.description: Use your phone to scan the QR code provided by the merchant.

step2.title: View the amount in BRL
step2.description: See the transaction amount converted to your local currency (e.g., Brazilian Real).

step3.title: Instant PIX payment
step3.description: Confirm and complete the payment using your preferred PIX method.

step4.title: Merchant receives USD
step4.description: The merchant instantly receives the payment in their local currency (e.g., US Dollars).

rtpAdoption.title: The Future of Payments is Here
rtpAdoption.description: Real-Time Payments (RTP) are revolutionizing the global financial landscape. With rapid adoption rates and increasing transaction volumes, RTP systems are becoming the new standard for instant, secure, and efficient money transfers across borders.
